title: It's the Mr. Jonathan Show!
itunes:title: It's the Mr. Jonathan Show!
description: Hell freezes over as Dave Garofalo calls in sick, and Mr. Jonathan takes over the hosting duties.  Ernesto Perez Carillo Jr. (EP3), from E.P. Carillo, calls in to talk about the upcoming release of the new E.P. Carillo CORE MADURO LINE at this year's IPCPR.  Later in the show the boys smoke 100% all Colombian CARTEL.  It's time for the finer things in life...It's time for the Cigar Authority!
